title: Pink Floyd - Ceci nest pas WYWH - MQR-008
description:
Pink Floyd
Ceci n'est pas Wish You Were Here
MQR-008

CD 1
(SOYCD 1-9 on Side 2 Version)

1. Welcome To The Machine
2. Have A Cigar
3. Wish You Were Here
4. Shine On You Crazy Diamond (Parts 1-9)

CD 2
(Totally Mashed Up Version)

1. Shine On You Crazy Diamond (Parts 1-9 Mashed Up)
2. Have A Cigar (Roger and Roy Duet)
3. Welcome To The Machine (Drum Version)
4. Wish You Were Here

bonus:  Have A Cigar (album version, but with Roger and David vocals)


Re-edited in 2012 by CREAMCHEESE
using the original stereo, quad and alternative mixes of the album
included in the Immersion Box, except for the bonus Have A Cigar by }{eywood

Artwork by CREAMCHEESE

This is a fan-made release for fans and should not be used by any stinky, greedy bootlegger to make money with other peopleÃ¢â‚¬Ëœs work.

The aim of this release is to demonstrate how WYWH could have sounded with
- SOYCD as a single track,
- WTTM with drums (as played in 1987-89 on the AMLOR Tour),
- a different decision about the vocals on HaC.

If you like this release we at MQR urge you to buy the original album, in case you donÃ¢â‚¬Ëœt have it already. If you have it already, 
we recommend to buy the 2011 remaster as well, because it really sounds awesome.
